name: meview
description: Image/Video viewer for typical web media formats. Also supports zip-archives.

scripts.patch: cd app/ && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && cd .. && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch
scripts.postpatch: git add . && git commit -m "Patch" && git push
scripts.minor: cd app/ && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && cd .. && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor
scripts.postminor: git add . && git commit -m "Minor" && git push
scripts.major: cd app/ && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && cd .. && npm --no-git-tag-version version major
scripts.postmajor: git add . && git commit -m "Major" && git push
scripts.prebuild:win: npm run clean && npm run clean:dist
scripts.prebuild:mac: npm run clean && npm run clean:dist
scripts.prebuild:linux: npm run clean && npm run clean:dist
